Message: The user completes the submission of the form

I recently created a new advertiser account and submitted three ad campaigns. However, all of them have been stuck in "Pending" status for over 72 hours. I understand that the review process may take some time, but I wanted to check if there’s any issue with my account or the ads themselves.

Could you please look into this for me or let me know if any action is required on my end?

Hi there! I understand your concern about the pending status of your ad campaigns. If your account is new and hasn't been verified yet, this could be causing the delay. To proceed with the verification process and have your account approved, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners.
I have sent the requested business verification information last friday

Thank you for sending the business verification information. Since you sent it last Friday, it might still be under review. The verification process can take a few days. If you don't receive an update soon, I recommend following up with our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com to check on the status of your account verification.
